languages.text: "Клеменциа". {n}За фасадом строгости в твердом голосе Абеляра проступает тень сожаления.{/n} "Ты стояла во главе этой семьи, на твоих плечах лежала забота о каждом ее члене. Теперь вас обвиняют в предательстве, заговоре против Вольного Торговца, и всему роду угрожает смерть. Как ты могла это допустить?"

traits.locale_text: "Клеменциа". {n}За фасадом строгости в твердом голосе Абеляра проступает тень сожаления.{/n} "Ты стояла во главе этой семьи, на твоих плечах лежала забота о каждом члене семьи. Теперь вас обвиняют в предательстве, заговоре против Вольного Торговца, и всему роду угрожает смерть. Как ты могла это допустить?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Clementia." {n}A hint of sorrow creeps into Abelard's voice, belying his stern facade.{/n} "You were acting head of this family. You were supposed to take care of each and every family member. And now you are being accused of treason and collusion against the Rogue Trader, and the entire family is facing death. How could you let this happen?"
languages.original_text: "Клеменциа". {n}За фасадом строгости в твердом голосе Абеляра проступает тень сожаления.{/n} "Ты стояла во главе этой семьи, на твоих плечах лежала забота о каждом ее члене. Теперь вас обвиняют в предательстве, заговоре против Вольного Торговца, и всему роду угрожает смерть. Как ты могла это допустить?"

traits.locale_text: "Clementia." {n}A shadow of regret shows up fin Abelard's voice, from behind his stern facade.{/n} "You were at the head of this family, and you had to take care of each and every family member. And now you are being accused of treason, the conspiracy against the Rogue Trader, and the entire family is facing a threat of death. How could you let this happen?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Clementia." {n}A shadow of regret shows up fin Abelard's voice, from behind his stern facade.{/n} "You were at the head of this family, and you had to take care of each and every family member. And now you are being accused of treason, the conspiracy against the Rogue Trader, and the entire family is facing a threat of death. How could you let this happen?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Clementia." {n}A shadow of regret shows up in Abelard's voice, from behind his stern facade.{/n} "You led this family and you were supposed to take care of each and every family member. And now you are being accused of treason and the collusion against the Rogue Trader, and the entire family is facing possible death. How could you let this happen?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Clementia." {n}A shadow of regret shows up in Abelard's voice, from behind his stern facade.{/n} "You led this family and you were supposed to take care of each and every family member. And now you are being accused of treason and the collusion against the Rogue Trader, and the entire family is facing possible death. How could you let this happen?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Clementia." {n}A hint of sorrow creeps into Abelard's voice, belying his stern facade.{/n} "You were acting head of this family. You were supposed to take care of each and every family member. And now you are being accused of treason and collusion against the Rogue Trader, and the entire family is facing death. How could you let this happen?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Clementia." {n}A hint of sorrow creeps into Abelard's voice, belying his stern facade.{/n} "You were acting head of this family. You were supposed to take care of each and every family member. And now you are being accused of treason and collusion against the Rogue Trader, and the entire family is facing death. How could you let this happen?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「クレメンティア」{n}うわべこそ容赦ないが、アベラルドの声にはほのかな悲しみが滲んでいる。{/n}「あなたにはこの一族を導き、一族の全員をそれぞれ監督する役割がありました。それが今では、自由開拓者に対する反逆と通謀の罪で訴えられ、一族全体を死の危機にさらしているのです。どうしてこのような事態を招いたのでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "Clementia." {n}A hint of sorrow creeps into Abelard's voice, belying his stern facade.{/n} "You were acting head of this family. You were supposed to take care of each and every family member. And now you are being accused of treason and collusion against the Rogue Trader, and the entire family is facing death. How could you let this happen?"

traits.locale_text: 「クレメンティア」{n}うわべこそ容赦ないが、アベラルドの声にはほのかな悲しみが滲んでいる。{/n}「あなたにはこの一族を導き、一族の全員をそれぞれ監督する役割がありました。それが今では、自由開拓者に対する反逆と通謀の罪で訴えられ、一族全体を死の危機にさらしているのです。どうしてこのような事態を招いたのでしょう？」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “克莱门缇雅。”{n}阿贝拉德严峻的面容下流露出一丝哀伤之色。{/n}“你是我们家族的代理族长，理应照顾好所有族人。可现在，你却让整个家族蒙上里通外敌、阴谋背叛行商浪人的罪名，几乎将整个家族推入覆亡的深渊。你到底是怎么走到这一步的？”
languages.original_text: "Clementia." {n}A hint of sorrow creeps into Abelard's voice, belying his stern facade.{/n} "You were acting head of this family. You were supposed to take care of each and every family member. And now you are being accused of treason and collusion against the Rogue Trader, and the entire family is facing death. How could you let this happen?"

traits.locale_text: “克莱门缇雅。”{n}阿贝拉德严峻的面容下流露出一丝惋惜之情。{/n}“你是我们家族的族长，理应照顾好所有族人。可现在，你却让整个家族蒙上里通外敌、阴谋背叛行商浪人的罪名，几乎将整个家族推入覆亡的深渊。你到底是怎么走到这一步的？”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Clémentia. » {n}Teintée de regret, la voix d'Abélard contraste avec son expression impassible.{/n} « En tant que matriarche de cette maison, il est de ton devoir de veiller sur chacun de ses membres. Mais aujourd'hui, tu es accusée de trahison et de conspiration envers {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, et toute notre famille risque d'être exécutée. Comment as-tu pu laisser faire une chose pareille ? »
languages.original_text: "Clementia." {n}A hint of sorrow creeps into Abelard's voice, belying his stern facade.{/n} "You were acting head of this family. You were supposed to take care of each and every family member. And now you are being accused of treason and collusion against the Rogue Trader, and the entire family is facing death. How could you let this happen?"

traits.locale_text: « Clémentia. » {n}La voix d'Abélard est teintée de regret, même si son expression demeure impassible.{/n} « En tant que matriarche de cette maison, il est de ton devoir de veiller sur chacun de ses membres. Mais aujourd'hui, tu es accusée de trahison et de conspiration envers {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, et toute notre famille risque d'être exécutée. Comment as-tu pu laisser faire une chose pareille ? »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Clementia». {n}Se puede oír un ligero pesar en la voz de Abelard, a pesar de su rígida fachada.{/n} «Actuaba como líder de esta familia y se supone que debía cuidar de todos y cada uno de sus miembros. Ahora se le acusa de traición y de confabulación contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y toda la familia podría enfrentarse a la muerte. ¿Cómo ha podido dejar que pase?».
languages.original_text: "Clementia." {n}A hint of sorrow creeps into Abelard's voice, belying his stern facade.{/n} "You were acting head of this family. You were supposed to take care of each and every family member. And now you are being accused of treason and collusion against the Rogue Trader, and the entire family is facing death. How could you let this happen?"

traits.locale_text: «Clementia». {n}Se puede oír un ligero pesar en la voz de Abelard, abriéndose paso a través de su rígida fachada.{/n} «Lideraba esta familia y se supone que debía cuidar de todos y cada uno de sus miembros. Ahora se le acusa de traición y de confabulación contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y toda la familia podría enfrentarse a la muerte. ¿Cómo ha podido dejar que pase?».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Clementia." {n}Ein Anflug von Trauer schleicht sich in Abelards Stimme, auch wenn seine Miene streng bleibt.{/n} "Ihr wart kommissarisches Oberhaupt dieser Familie. Das Wohlergehen sämtlicher Mitglieder lag in Euren Händen. Und nun werdet Ihr des Hochverrats und der Verschwörung gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} beschuldigt und die ganze Familie könnte hingerichtet werden. Wie konntet Ihr das zulassen?"
languages.original_text: "Clementia." {n}A hint of sorrow creeps into Abelard's voice, belying his stern facade.{/n} "You were acting head of this family. You were supposed to take care of each and every family member. And now you are being accused of treason and collusion against the Rogue Trader, and the entire family is facing death. How could you let this happen?"

traits.locale_text: "Clementia." {n}Ein Schatten der Reue schleicht in Abelards Stimme, von hinter seiner strengen Fassade.{/n} "Ihr habt diese Familie angeführt, das Wohlergehen sämtlicher Mitglieder lag in Euren Händen. Und nun werde Ihr des Hochverrats und der Verschwörung gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} beschuldigt und die ganze Familie könnte hingerichtet werden. Wie konntet Ihr das zulassen?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Clementia." {n}Abelard'ın sesine hâkim olan hafif kasvet, sert üslubunun göstermelik olduğunu ortaya koyuyor.{/n} "Vekâleten bu hanenin başındaydın. Tüm hane mensuplarıyla ilgilenmek senin mesuliyetindi. Şimdiyse ihanet ve Hür Tacir'e karşı gelme suçlarıyla itham ediliyorsun. Hanenin tamamı idamla karşı karşıya. Buna nasıl müsaade edebildin?"
languages.original_text: "Clementia." {n}A hint of sorrow creeps into Abelard's voice, belying his stern facade.{/n} "You were acting head of this family. You were supposed to take care of each and every family member. And now you are being accused of treason and collusion against the Rogue Trader, and the entire family is facing death. How could you let this happen?"

traits.locale_text: "Clementia" {n}Abelard'ın sesine hâkim olan hafif kasvet, sert üslubunun göstermelik olduğunu ortaya koyuyor.{/n} "Bu hanenin vekil önderiydin. Tüm hane mensuplarıyla ilgilenmek senin mesuliyetindi. Şimdiyse ihanet ve Hür Tacir'e karşı gelme suçlarıyla itham ediliyorsun. Hanenin tamamı idamla karşı karşıya. Buna nasıl müsaade edersin?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
